docs.title: MATRIX Data Model Documentation
docs.text:
The collected MATRIX schemas

Schema PURL: https://w3id.org/everycure-org/matrix-schema

docs.title: Introduction
docs.text: Here, you can find the collected documentation of all public data products created by the Matrix project. This includes the schemas for our KG products and the disease list.

docs.title: Classes
docs.text: Class Description DiseaseListEntry A disease entry in the disease list. MatrixDiseaseList A list of diseases. MatrixEdge An edge representing a relationship between two nodes in the Biolink knowledge graph. MatrixEdgeList A container for MatrixEdge objects. MatrixNode A node in the Biolink knowledge graph. MatrixNodeList A container for MatrixNode objects.

docs.title: Disease List Entry (schema class)
docs.text:
A disease entry in the disease list.

URI: matrix_schema:DiseaseListEntry

docs.title: Attributes
docs.text: Name Description Cardinality and Range category_class The disase identifier. Slot name should probably be renamed? 1  String label The name of the disease. 1  String definition The definition of the disease. 0..1  String synonyms Any exact synonyms of the disease. 1..*  String subsets The subsets of the disease in which it is part. 1..*  String crossreferences Cross-references to other databases and ontologies. 1..*  String is_matrix_manually_excluded Flag to denote this disease was manually excluded from the disease list by a Matrix medical expert. 1  Boolean is_matrix_manually_included Flag to denote this disease was manually included from the disease list by a Matrix medical expert. 1  Boolean is_clingen Flag to denote that this disease term is used directly by https://clinicalgenome.org/ (a major authority on genetic diseases), which is a strong indication that it corresponds to a real disease entity. 1  Boolean is_grouping_subset Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a grouping term. 1  Boolean is_grouping_subset_ancestor Flag to denote this disease is a parent of a disease that was manually curated to be a grouping term. 1  Boolean is_orphanet_subtype Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease subtype according to Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/), one of the most important rare disease authorities in the world. 1  Boolean is_orphanet_subtype_descendant Flag to denote this disease is a child/descendant of a disease that is manually curated  to be a disease subtype according to Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/), one of the most  important rare disease authorities in the world. If it is a descendant of a subtype, it most likely is a subtype itself. 1  Boolean is_omimps Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a phenotypic series according to OMIM (https://www.omim.org/),  one of the most important genetic disease authorities in the world.  A Phenotypic Series is a grouping of genetic heterogeneity of similar phenotypes across the genome. 1  Boolean is_omimps_descendant Flag to denote this disease is a child/descendant of a disease that is manually curated  to be a phenotypic series according to OMIM (https://www.omim.org/), one of the most  important genetic disease authorities in the world. If it is a descendant of a phenotypic series, it most likely is a proper genetic disease entity (or subtype). 1  Boolean is_leaf Flag to denote this disease is a leaf node in the disease hierarchy.  A leaf node is a node that has no children in the hierarchy. 1  Boolean is_leaf_direct_parent Flag to denote this disease is a direct parent of a leaf node in the disease hierarchy.  A direct parent of a leaf rarely corresponds to a grouping, and often is a proper disease entity. 1  Boolean is_orphanet_disorder Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease according to Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/),  one of the most important rare disease authorities in the world.  A disorder according to Orphanet usually corresponds to a proper disease entity, not a grouping or a subtype. 1  Boolean is_omim Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease according to OMIM (https://www.omim.org/),  one of the most important genetic disease authorities in the world.  A disease according to OMIM usually corresponds to a proper disease entity or a subtype, not a disease grouping. 1  Boolean is_icd_category Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD category. Category codes (or subcategory codes), for example A01.1 (Paratyphoid fever A),  can be recognised by containing a period (.) character and usually represent specific  diagnosable diseases. 1  Boolean is_icd_chapter_code Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD chapter code. Chapter codes (or block codes), for example A00-B99 (Certain infectious and parasitic diseases).  These codes can be recognised by containing a dash (-) character, and usually represent broad categories of diseases. 1  Boolean is_icd_chapter_header Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD chapter header. Chapter headers (or chapter titles), for example A00 (Cholera) can be identified by codes without dashes or periods and are usually the top-level categories within each chapter. Most of the time, these are not proper diseases, but groupings of diseases. 1  Boolean is_icd_billable Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD code that is billable. Billable codes are usually the most specific codes that can be used for billing purposes, and are most of the time diagnosable diseases. 1  Boolean is_mondo_subtype Flag to denote this disease was identified to be a subtype through lexical matching. This method is maintained by the Every Cure medical team and the Disease List team. 1  Boolean is_pathway_defect Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a pathway defect rather than a proper disease. 1  Boolean is_susceptibility Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a susceptibility rather than a proper disease. 1  Boolean is_paraphilic Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a paraphilic disorder rather than a proper disease. 1  Boolean is_acquired Flag to denote this disease corresponds to an acquired form of a disease. 1  Boolean is_andor Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that is a combination of two or more diseases. 1  Boolean is_withorwithout Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that can be present with or without some other pathological condition. 1  Boolean is_obsoletion_candidate Flag to denote that this disease is marked for obsoletion in the (near) future. This status does not guarantee that the disease will be obsoleted, but it is a strong indication. 1  Boolean is_unclassified_hereditary Flag to denote that this disease has no descendants (is a leaf) and  is classified broadly as an hereditary disease, but lacks any further classification. 1  Boolean official_matrix_filter Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that can be treated with small molecules or biologics. This flag is maintained as a combination of default filters by the Matrix team. Changes to this filter should be discussed on the Matrix disease list issue tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). Warning. This flag is in early alpha state, and its use in production systems is not recommended. 1  Boolean harrisons_view Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping according to the Harrison's textbook. Top-level classes in Mondo are manually curated by the Mondo team to "belong" to a Harrison's textbook chapter. Disagreements should be reported on the Mondo issue tracker (https://github.com/monarch-initiative/mondo/issues). 1..*  String mondo_txgnn Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping as defined by the txgnn paper. Disease classes in Mondo are manually curated by the Mondo team to "belong" to a txgnn category. Disagreements should be reported on the Mondo issue  tracker (https://github.com/monarch-initiative/mondo/issues). 1..*  String mondo_top_grouping Tag to denote this disease to be a . Disease classes in Mondo are manually curated by the Mondo team to "belong" to a txgnn category. Disagreements should be reported on the Mondo issue  tracker (https://github.com/monarch-initiative/mondo/issues). 1..*  String medical_specialization Tag this disease with a medical specialisation. Disease classes are automatically tagged by an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1..*  String txgnn Tag this disease to be part of a grouping as defined by the txgnn paper. Disease classes in Mondo are automatically assigned to a txgnn category using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1..*  String anatomical Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping according to the anatomical location. Disease terms are automatically tagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1..*  String is_pathogen_caused Flag to denote if this disease is caused by a pathogen. Disease classes are automatically flagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1  Boolean is_cancer Flag to denote if this disease corresponds to a cancer type. Disease classes are automatically flagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1  Boolean is_glucose_dysfunction Flag to denote if this disease corresponds to a glucose dysfunction. Disease classes are automatically flagged using an LLM. tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1  Boolean tag_existing_treatment Flag to denote if this disease has some existing treatment. Disease classes are automatically flagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1  Boolean tag_qaly_lost Tag denoting the degree to which Quality-Adjusted Life Year (QALY) lost. Disease terms are automatically tagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). 1  String subset_group_id The identifier of a disease representing the subtype series this disease belongs to. 0..1  String subset_group_label The name (label) of a disease representing the subtype series this disease belongs to. 0..1  String other_subsets_count The number of other subtypes in the subset this disease belongs to. 0..1  Integer

      attribute_type:
        tag: attribute_type
        value: filter
      curation_type:
        tag: curation_type
        value: ontology_hierarchy
    description: 'Flag to denote this disease is a child/descendant of a disease that
      is manually curated  to be a disease subtype according to Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/),
      one of the most  important rare disease authorities in the world. If it is a
      descendant of a subtype, it most likely is a subtype itself.

    see_also:

      attribute_type:
        tag: attribute_type
        value: filter
      curation_type:
        tag: curation_type
        value: manual_mondo
    description: 'Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a phenotypic
      series according to OMIM (https://www.omim.org/),  one of the most important
      genetic disease authorities in the world.  A Phenotypic Series is a grouping
      of genetic heterogeneity of similar phenotypes across the genome.

    alias: is_omimps
    owner: DiseaseListEntry
    domain_of:
    - DiseaseListEntry
    range: boolean
    required: true
  is_omimps_descendant:
    name: is_omimps_descendant
    annotations:
      attribute_type:
        tag: attribute_type
        value: filter
      curation_type:
        tag: curation_type
        value: ontology_hierarchy
    description: 'Flag to denote this disease is a child/descendant of a disease that
      is manually curated  to be a phenotypic series according to OMIM (https://www.omim.org/),
      one of the most  important genetic disease authorities in the world. If it is
      a descendant of a phenotypic series, it most likely is a proper genetic disease

    description: 'Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease

    annotations:
      attribute_type:
        tag: attribute_type
        value: filter
      curation_type:
        tag: curation_type
        value: manual_mondo
    description: 'Flag to denote this disease is manually curated to be a disease

    range: boolean
    required: true

    annotations:
      attribute_type:
        tag: attribute_type
        value: filter
      curation_type:
        tag: curation_type
        value: manual_mondo
    description: 'Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD category.
      Category codes (or subcategory codes), for example A01.1 (Paratyphoid fever
      A),  can be recognised by containing a period (.) character and usually represent

    annotations:
      attribute_type:
        tag: attribute_type
        value: filter
      curation_type:
        tag: curation_type
        value: manual_mondo
    description: 'Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD chapter code.
      Chapter codes (or block codes), for example A00-B99 (Certain infectious and
      parasitic diseases).  These codes can be recognised by containing a dash (-)
      character, and usually represent broad categories of diseases.

      '
    from_schema: https://w3id.org/everycure-org/matrix-schema

    range: boolean

    annotations:

        tag: attribute_type
        value: filter
      curation_type:
        tag: curation_type
        value: manual_mondo

      Chapter headers (or chapter titles), for example A00 (Cholera) can be identified

docs.title: harrisons_view
docs.text:
URI: matrix_schema:harrisons_view

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry

Description

Tag to denote this disease to be part of a grouping according to the Harrison's textbook. Top-level classes in Mondo are manually curated by the Mondo team to "belong" to a Harrison's textbook chapter. Disagreements should be reported on the Mondo issue tracker (https://github.com/monarch-initiative/mondo/issues). __

URI: matrix_schema:is_icd_chapter_header

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry

Description

Flag to denote this disease was corresponds to an ICD chapter header. Chapter headers (or chapter titles), for example A00 (Cholera) can be identified by codes without dashes or periods and are usually the top-level categories within each chapter. Most of the time, these are not proper diseases, but groupings of diseases. __

URI: matrix_schema:is_orphanet_subtype_descendant

Flag to denote this disease is a child/descendant of a disease that is manually curated to be a disease subtype according to Orphanet (https://www.orpha.net/), one of the most important rare disease authorities in the world. URI: matrix_schema:official_matrix_filter

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry

Description

Flag to denote this disease corresponds to a disease that can be treated with small molecules or biologics. This flag is maintained as a combination of default filters by the Matrix team. Changes to this filter should be discussed on the Matrix disease list issue tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). Warning. This flag is in early alpha state, and its use in production systems is not recommended. __

docs.title: tag_existing_treatment
docs.text:
URI: matrix_schema:tag_existing_treatment

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry

Description

Flag to denote if this disease has some existing treatment. Disease classes are automatically flagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). __

docs.title: Properties
docs.text:
• Range: Boolean. The range of the element is the type of the value that can be assigned to it.

  • Required?: Optional

docs.title: Schema developer documentation
docs.text:
LinkML source 
name: tag_existing_treatment
annotations:
  attribute_type:
    tag: attribute_type
    value: filter
  curation_type:
    tag: curation_type
    value: llm
description: 'Flag to denote if this disease has some existing treatment. Disease
  classes are automatically flagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported
  on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues).

  '
from_schema: https://w3id.org/everycure-org/matrix-schema
rank: 1000
alias: tag_existing_treatment
domain_of:
- DiseaseListEntry
range: boolean

docs.title: tag_qaly_lost
docs.text:
URI: matrix_schema:tag_qaly_lost

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry

Description

Tag denoting the degree to which Quality-Adjusted Life Year (QALY) lost. Disease terms are automatically tagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). __

docs.title: Properties
docs.text:
• Range: String. The range of the element is the type of the value that can be assigned to it.

  • Required?: Required Regex pattern*: ^(low|medium|high|very_high|none)$

docs.title: Schema developer documentation
docs.text:
LinkML source 
name: tag_qaly_lost
annotations:
  curation_type:
    tag: curation_type
    value: llm
description: 'Tag denoting the degree to which Quality-Adjusted Life Year (QALY) lost.
  Disease terms are automatically tagged using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported
  on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues).

  '
from_schema: https://w3id.org/everycure-org/matrix-schema
rank: 1000
alias: tag_qaly_lost
domain_of:
- DiseaseListEntry
range: string
required: true
pattern: ^(low|medium|high|very_high|none)$

docs.title: txgnn
docs.text:
URI: matrix_schema:txgnn

Applicable to: DiseaseListEntry

Description

Tag this disease to be part of a grouping as defined by the txgnn paper. Disease classes in Mondo are automatically assigned to a txgnn category using an LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue tracker (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues). __

docs.title: Properties
docs.text:
• Range: String. The range of the element is the type of the value that can be assigned to it.
  • Multivalued: True. If the element is multivalued, more than one value can be attached to the same field. In the TSV format, these are | separated.
  • Required?: Optional

docs.title: See Also
docs.text:
These are some relevant resources you might find useful to get additional information about the element, such as example implementations, external websites, issues and pull requests.

  • https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC11645266/

docs.title: Schema developer documentation
docs.text:
LinkML source 
name: txgnn
annotations:
  attribute_type:
    tag: attribute_type
    value: grouping
  curation_type:
    tag: curation_type
    value: llm
description: 'Tag this disease to be part of a grouping as defined by the txgnn paper.
  Disease classes in Mondo are automatically assigned to a txgnn category using an
  LLM. Problems/issues should be reported on the Matrix disease list issue  tracker
  (https://github.com/everycure-org/matrix-disease-list/issues).

  '
from_schema: https://w3id.org/everycure-org/matrix-schema
see_also:
- https://pmc.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/articles/PMC11645266/
rank: 1000
alias: txgnn
domain_of:
- DiseaseListEntry
range: string
multivalued: true
inlined: true
inlined_as_list: true
